mapper.select: select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by recent_id desc) as recent_no, p.* from recently_viewed rv , product p where rv.member_id = #{memberId} and p.product_id = rv.product_id ) recent2 where recent2.recent_no between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.delete: delete from recently_viewed where member_id = #{memberId} order by recent_id limit 1
